variable.name: New_SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID (GENEVA)

variable.name: Old_SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID (CARe)

variable.name: ESP_Cohort
variable.description: Cohort name [CARDIA]

variable.name: ESP_phenotype
variable.description: ESP Phenotype group (phenotype that the sample was selected to be sequenced for) [LDL_Low, LDL_High, BP_Low, BP_High, DPR, BMI_High

variable.name: Sequence_center
variable.description: Indicates where the sample was sequence at [Broad, UW]

variable.name: Target
variable.description: Indicates target capture used in sequencing

variable.name: ESP_race_selfreport
variable.description: Self report race [European American, African American]

variable.name: ESP_sex_selfreport
variable.description: Values: Male; Female

variable.name: ESP_study_site_or_subcohort
variable.description: Clinic or field center within cohort

variable.name: ESP_age_baseline
variable.description: Age in years at baseline

variable.name: ESP_mi_baseline
variable.description: MI status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_frs_chdprob_baseline
variable.description: Framingham Risk Score predicted prob. calculated at baseline (was not calculated for those with baseline history of MI)

variable.name: ESP_bmi_baseline
variable.description: Baseline BMI in kg/m2

variable.name: ESP_t2diabetes_baseline
variable.description: Diabetes status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_weight_baseline
variable.description: Weight in kg. at baseline

variable.name: ESP_waist_baseline
variable.description: Waist in cm at baseline

variable.name: ESP_whr_baseline
variable.description: Waist to hip ratio at baseline

variable.name: ESP_height_baseline
variable.description: Standing height in cm at baseline

variable.name: ESP_ldl_baseline
variable.description: Baseline calculated LDL in mg/dL (missing where trigs>400)

variable.name: ESP_hdl_baseline
variable.description: HDL level in mg/dL at baseline

variable.name: ESP_trigs_baseline
variable.description: Triglycerides at baseline in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_totchol_baseline
variable.description: Total cholesterol at baseline in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_lipid_med_baseline
variable.description: Any lipid lowering med (statin or other) at baseline

variable.name: ESP_sbp_baseline
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure at baseline (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: ESP_dbp_baseline
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure at baseline (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: ESP_htn_status_baseline
variable.description: Physician diagnosed hypertension status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_htn_med_baseline
variable.description: Hypertension med status (any) at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_current_smoker_baseline
variable.description: Current smoking status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_former_smoker_baseline
variable.description: Former smoking status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_menarche
variable.description: Age in years at menarche

variable.name: ESP_fastglucose_baseline
variable.description: Blood fasting insulin at baseline in uU/mL. (Note that there are some extreme outliers)

variable.name: ESP_fastinsulin_baseline
variable.description: Blood fasting glucose at baseline in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_fibrinogen
variable.description: Fibrinogen level in mg/dL at first designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_fibrinogen
variable.description: Age in years at Fibrinogen measurement

variable.name: ESP_factorvii
variable.description: Factor VII level in % at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_factorvii
variable.description: Age in years at Factor VII measurement

variable.name: ESP_factorviii
variable.description: Factor VIII level in % at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_factorviii
variable.description: Age in years at Factor VIII measurement

variable.name: ESP_vwf
variable.description: VWF level in % at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_vwf
variable.description: Age in years at visit of hemostatic factors measurement

variable.name: ESP_crp
variable.description: C-reactive protein level in mg/L at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_crp
variable.description: Age in years at CRP measurement

variable.name: ESP_icam1
variable.description: ICAM1 level in ng/mL at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_icam1
variable.description: Age in years at ICAM1 measurement

variable.name: ESP_pselectin
variable.description: P-selectin level at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_pselectin
variable.description: Age in years at P-selectin measurement

variable.name: ESP_wbc
variable.description: White blood count in x1,000/cubic mm at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_wbc
variable.description: Age in years at WBC measurement

variable.name: ESP_hemoglobin
variable.description: Hemoglobin at designated visit (may not be baseline) in g/dl

variable.name: ESP_age_at_hemoglobin
variable.description: Age in years at hemoglobin measurement

variable.name: ESP_hematocrit
variable.description: Hematocrit at designated visit (may not be baseline) in %

variable.name: ESP_age_at_hematocrit
variable.description: Age in years at hematocrit measurement

variable.name: ESP_platelet_count
variable.description: Platelet count at designated visit (may not be baseline) in x 1000/cubic mm

variable.name: ESP_age_at_platelet_count
variable.description: Age in years at platelet count measurement

variable.name: ESP_red_blood_count
variable.description: Red blood cell count in million cells per microliter at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_rbc
variable.description: Age in years at red blood cell count measurement

variable.name: ESP_neutrophils
variable.description: Neutrophils in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be baseline).

variable.name: ESP_monocytes
variable.description: Monocytes in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be baseline).

variable.name: ESP_lymphocytes
variable.description: Lymphocytes in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be baseline).

variable.name: ESP_eosinophils
variable.description: Eosinophils in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be baseline).

variable.name: ESP_basophils
variable.description: Basophils in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_secondary_blood_counts
variable.description: Age in years at secondary blood count measurements (MCV, RBC, Neutrophils, Monocytes, Lymphocytes, Eosinophils, Basophils)

variable.name: ESP_cac_agatston_score
variable.description: Coronary artery calcium Agatston total score

variable.name: ESP_age_at_cac
variable.description: Age in years at CAC Agatston score measurement

variable.name: ESP_uric_acid
variable.description: Uric acid in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_age_at_uric_acid
variable.description: Age in years at uric acid measurement

variable.name: ESP_urinary_albumin
variable.description: Raw urinary albumin.

variable.name: ESP_age_at_urinary_albumin
variable.description: Age in years at urinary albumin measurement

variable.name: ESP_urinary_creatinine
variable.description: Raw urinary creatinine in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_age_at_urinary_creatinine
variable.description: Age in years at urinary creatinine measurement

variable.name: ESP_serum_creatinine
variable.description: Serum creatinine in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_age_at_serum_creatinine
variable.description: Age at serum creatinine measurement

variable.name: ESP_gout
variable.description: May be MD-reported, self-reported, or abstracted from patients taking allopurinol. Ever had gout through study.

variable.name: ESP_asthma_ever
variable.description: Asthma ever diagnosed (0/1), assessed at baseline visit (only for HeartGO and WHISP)

variable.name: ESP_chronic_bronchitis_ever
variable.description: Chronic bronchitis ever diagnosed (0/1), assessed at baseline visit (only for HeartGO and WHISP)

variable.name: ESP_emphysema_ever
variable.description: Emphysema ever diagnosed (0/1), assessed at baseline visit (only for HeartGO and WHISP)

variable.name: ESP_copd_ever
variable.description: COPD ever diagnosed (0/1), assessed at baseline visit (only for HeartGO and WHISP)

variable.name: ESP_pneumonia_ever
variable.description: Pneumonia ever diagnosed (0/1), assessed at baseline visit (only for HeartGO and WHISP)

variable.name: ESP_fev1_first_avail_visit
variable.description: FEV1 measurement at the first available visit (only for HeartGO)

variable.name: ESP_fvc_first_avail_visit
variable.description: FVC measurement at the first available visit (only for HeartGO)

variable.name: ESP_lung_function_visit
variable.description: The visit that lung function measurements were taken
